@graph.name: Vegetable Balti - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This easy Vegetable Balti is a really delicious way to get the family to eat healthy veggies! Glutenfree Soyfree and Nutfree Balti sauce

@graph.name: Vegetable Balti
@graph.description: This easy Vegetable Balti is a really delicious way to get the family to eat healthy veggies like bell pepper and cauliflower, as the Balti Spices add a fantastic Indian flavor to them. 1 Pan, Baked Balti Casserole. A wonderfully rich and hearty Indian Balti sauce that is packed with veggie vitamins . Glutenfree Soyfree and Nutfree.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 teaspoon coriander seeds  (or use ground coriander)
1/2 teaspoon nigella seeds ( or use 1 teaspoon dried onion flakes)
1/4 teaspoon cumin seeds  (or use ground cumin)
1/4 teaspoon fenugreek leaves ( or 1/8 teaspoon fenugreek seeds)
1  red bell pepper sliced or use a mix of red and green
1 cup cubed sweet potato or butternut squash
8 ounce tomato puree (canned also called tomato sauce depending on the brand. Use unseasoned)

recipeInstructions.text: Grind the spices in a spice grinder and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Grind the spices in a spice grinder and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a baking dish, add the oil, onion, garlic, and ginger and the spice mix and mix well, and spread it around.
recipeInstructions.name: In a baking dish, add the oil, onion, garlic, and ginger and the spice mix and mix well, and spread it around.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 c) for 9-11 minutes or until the onion is translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 c) for 9-11 minutes or until the onion is translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add in the veggies, tomatoes, tomato puree, salt, and water and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add in the veggies, tomatoes, tomato puree, salt, and water and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Then put the dish back in the oven to bake for 35-45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Then put the dish back in the oven to bake for 35-45 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the dish after the first 20 minutes so that the edges don't burn too much. Check if the cauliflower and sweet potato are cooked to preference. Otherwise, bake a little bit longer.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the dish after the first 20 minutes so that the edges don't burn too much. Check if the cauliflower and sweet potato are cooked to preference. Otherwise, bake a little bit longer.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven. Garnish with cilantro and lime juice and serve with Roth flatbread, naan or rice
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the oven. Garnish with cilantro and lime juice and serve with Roth flatbread, naan or rice

recipeInstructions.text: To make this on stovetop: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. combine onion garlic ginger and spices and cook until  golden. Add tomatoes and cook for a few mins until tender , add the purée, salt, veggies and 1/4 cup water. Cover and cook until veggies are tender (14-17 mins) . Stir occasionally. Taste and adjust  flavor. Add more water or some creamy milk to adjust consistent if needed, bring to a boil then take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: To make this on stovetop: Heat oil over medium heat in a large skillet. combine onion garlic ginger and spices and cook until  golden. Add tomatoes and cook for a few mins until tender , add the purée, salt, veggies and 1/4 cup water. Cover and cook until veggies are tender (14-17 mins) . Stir occasionally. Taste and adjust  flavor. Add more water or some creamy milk to adjust consistent if needed, bring to a boil then take off heat.
